mapper.select: SELECT resume_no, user_no, (SELECT user_name FROM tb_userinfo u WHERE u.user_no = r.user_no AND u.status_yn = 'N')AS user_name, title, desired_position, template_no, resume_file_name, resume_file_pypath, resume_file_lopath, publication_yn, create_date, (SELECT count(*) FROM tb_resume_like l WHERE l.user_no = #{user_no} AND l.resume_no = r.resume_no)AS resume_liked FROM tb_resume_info r WHERE status_yn = 'N' ORDER BY create_date DESC

SELECT resume_no, user_no, title, desired_position, template_no, resume_file_name, resume_file_pypath, resume_file_lopath FROM tb_resume_info WHERE resume_no in (select resume_no from tb_resume_like where user_no = #{user_no})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_resume_info ( user_no, title, desired_position, template_no, resume_file_name, resume_file_pypath, resume_file_lopath, status_yn, publication_yn ) VALUES ( #{user_no}, #{title}, #{desired_position}, #{template_no}, #{resume_file_name}, #{resume_file_pypath}, #{resume_file_lopath}, 'N', #{publication_yn} )
mapper.select: SELECT resume_no, link_name, link_url FROM tb_link_info WHERE resume_no = #{resume_no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_resume_like WHERE resume_no = #{resume_no} AND user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM tb_resume_like WHERE resume_no = #{resume_no}
SELECT template_no, template_name, file_pypath, file_lopath FROM tb_template ORDER BY template_no
SELECT template_no, template_name, file_pypath, file_lopath FROM tb_template where template_no=#{template_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_template ( template_no, template_name, file_pypath, file_lopath ) VALUES ( #{template_no}, #{template_name}, #{file_pypath}, #{file_lopath} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_no, login_id, user_type, user_name, password, birthday, sex, hp, DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(withdrawal_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS withdrawal_date, status_yn, expire_days, address, hobby, notes FROM tb_userinfo WHERE user_no = #{user_no} AND status_yn = 'N' AND withdrawal_date IS NULL
